text:
I've attended Youth Service in Mount Carmel since Feb 2023. I can now safely say that Mt Carmel has changed my life.
With a wonderful congregation and meaningful sermons preached by dedicated pastors, I find myself growing closer and closer to God.
Excellent place to meet new people and gather for big events.

Itâ€™s good to look for a church that has at its core Word & Prayer that leads congregations to full Worship of Father, Son & Holy Spirit where you enjoy fellowship with believers & reach out to others as you serve one another!

Many churches will lean more in 1 way and thus we call those traditional (Law) or charismatic (Grace)! Look Biblically & wholistically for any church you want to belong to ðŸ˜‰.

This highly Word-based churchâ€™s vision is to bring generations together to love God & love people. Like any church, it will always be a work in progress! However, they are a solid church!!
This church has changed my life. Praise God!
Healthy fellowship and caring seniors. I attended their thanksgiving anniversary, the message was deep and meaningful
